game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, players take on the role of a Seeker tasked with uncovering the cause behind this cataclysmic event. As they journey across diverse realms, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, battle formidable enemies, and forge alliances with enigmatic factions.
game.beginning: The game begins in the kingdom of Alderan, where the player discovers a cryptic message hinting at the loss of magic's origin. The Seeker sets out to gather information from the wisest scholars and embark on a perilous quest to find answers.
game.ending: Upon reaching the Heartwood Tree, the Seeker learns that magic can be restored by solving ancient puzzles hidden within an intricate network of mystical sites. With newfound knowledge, the player must make sacrifices and confront their own destiny to bring balance back to the realms and restore magic to the world.
